website_summaries.verdict: An affordably priced, durable mirror for rear-facing babies.
pros: Mirror is made of shatterproof safety glass
Highly maneuverable with a pivot of 360 degrees
cons: Some image distortion is noted, and some parents say they have to adjust it frequently to get the best view

website_summaries.verdict: This mirror comes with a lifetime warranty and is comparable with most cars.
pros: Designed to fit most cars, SUVs, vans, and trucks
Comes with a lifetime satisfaction guarantee
Made out of acrylic safety glass that is shatter proof
Dimensions are 11.7" x 7.5" making it one of the larger ones on the market
cons: Some customers commented that the  handle broke off after limited use

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror! My daughter and I are bot a lot happier to take car trips. Good quality. Easy instillation. Recommend to anyone with a rear facer!
customer_reviews.author: BrittneyCarbajal

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love !!! I struggled a little to put it together because I didn’t read the instructions but after reading it was 1,2,3
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. I have an hour and a half commute I do every week and it was making me so nervous not to see my little princess the whole drive. With this I can check my review mirror without turning and make sure she’s okay. Warning it does have to be mounted to a head rest. My Jeep only has head rest on the outside seats so I had to angle it.
customer_reviews.author: RenaC

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this car mirror! It's extra large so I'm able to see everything in the back seat pretty much. It's very easy to adjust & has a ton of positioning options- love the swivel head! Liked it so much I got one for each of our cars! Only downside is that it's easy to bump putting baby in/getting baby out of the car & you have to adjust it back to position..
customer_reviews.author: R. Eldredge

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mirror for the first time almost 1 1/2 years ago for my car so I could keep an eye on my little man. Now that he is a growing toddler well on his way to his terrible two’s I am even more impressed with the mirror. It had totally withstood his kicking fits! I also love that once it is mounted I can swivel it from vertical to horizontal without having to take it off the head rest. My husband was jealous that I had a mirror and he didn’t that he finally bought one for his car. We are expecting baby boy #2 in March and we’ve already registered for two more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Filger

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is just what I was looking for. It was easy to put together, and I can see my baby perfectly, but it's not at all distracting from driving. No complaints, and would definitely repurchase if anything happened to this one!
customer_reviews.author: ADTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MIRROR! I made the mistake of buying a mirror that was not on a swivel like this one and it was awful. It kept moving every time I hit a bump so I had to keep readjusting it. This one stays put and is nice and big so you can see your baby easily. It's also really easy to install... the mirror just snaps together and you just snap the fasteners together and tighten. You will love this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Seibert

customer_reviews.title: Dont like the logo
customer_reviews.text: Over all looks good. Just one thing i would like to mention. Mirror in the display picture doesnot have any "sonilove" logo but mirror deliver to me does. I was expecting plan black color border. I expect the exact same product what shown in the display picture. Nothing wrong with mirror. Quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror! The size is perfect. Take time to adjust, I rushed and pulled on it too hard and the strap snapped.
customer_reviews.author: dolores maldonado

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a more sturdy and adjustable backseat mirror and this one is just ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a more sturdy and adjustable backseat mirror and this one is just perfect for the job! I can adjust it to whatever place I need to and unlike others this one actually stays in place very well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Whitebread

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror! My husband installed it and said it was very easy to install. It gives me peace of mind that I can look into the rearview mirror and see her in this mirror. It’s big so you can see a lot. The only thing I have noticed is I will sometimes have to pull down my sunglasses to see the mirror better because when I have them on it’s sometimes hard to see her in the mirror. I definitely recommend this mirror and the price of it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sheron

customer_reviews.title: Pivot head is where it's at!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is AMAZING. With my previous child, I had a standard flat mirror from a big box store. Issue with those is that they will go at whatever angle your headrest is and because of that, most of the time it was never at the angle you needed to see your kid. With this mirror, it's nice and large and it's on a pivot head. Now I can angle it any way I need so I can actually see my child in the review mirror. Bought a second and very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. It's very big so i can see all of babe easily and the picture quality is perfectly clear. It's easy to move and adjust but won't move around in its own to where you have to fix where it's reflecting. My kids love to stare in it as I'm driving as well which keeps them happy and in turn keeps me happy. I had bought two others one from target and Ross before finding this one. This is by far the best and wish i hadn't wasted my money on the others
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror works perfectly for our car! We tried a few different ones from Target with no luck and after a friend recommended this one, we ordered it and it’s exactly what we were looking for! Adjustable and provides a great view of baby! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Dinter

customer_reviews.title: We can see our little from the driver's seat and he enjoys car rides much better when he can see his reflection
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. We can see our little from the driver's seat and he enjoys car rides much better when he can see his reflection. Simple to install and fits well in our Toyota Carolla.
customer_reviews.author: r. olm

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy swivel
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many back seat mirrors for my infant and this one seamed to be the best. The swivel is easy to maneuver yet very still in place. The piece looks like an acutual mirror, not like a reflective plastic piece like most baby items. I feel comfortable driving with my baby now that I can always see her
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product, very large visibility.
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product, very large visibility. Only reason 4/5 was the straps could've been a bit better. Just personal experience with it. I rate the straps 2/5. I secured the straps with extra strong red string. The mirror 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Jett P.

customer_reviews.title: Adjustability is a nice feature
customer_reviews.text: I bought this baby car mirror to replace an old one that my children had battered over the past several years. I love this one even more than my old one because you can pivot and angle the mirror as necessary to get the best view of your child. You can also tighten it very tightly to the head rest so that it doesn't shift, which is something that used to happen with my old baby mirror when my kids would knock into it. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: easily adjustable, and can move the mirror around at ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits on our back seat headrest well, easily adjustable, and can move the mirror around at the base to see just what you want from your rear view mirror! Been great for long car trips! Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This works great, I ordered it for my daughter so she could see her new born in the back but this will only work on cars with rear adjustable headrests. some cars like most Fords the rear headrest is formed right in to the seat and will not attach because the straps have nothing to attached too.
customer_reviews.author: Ergov

customer_reviews.title: ... only giving this 1 star because it is a good concept but awful product
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving this 1 star because it is a good concept but awful product. Mirror doesn’t stay in the base. The clip to hold it is so cheap and flimsy that it falls right off. Mine stayed on less than 36 hours! I wish I hadn’t waisted my money.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer stroup

customer_reviews.title: Great to see your baby in.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The mirror is wide and big and my baby likes to look at himself through it. I drive a Honda CR-V and it’s perfect to see him through the rear view mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani

customer_reviews.title: Sonilove Car Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! Mirror Is Very Clear ! Very Easy To Install !!
customer_reviews.author: Clay and Tabitha parson

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror.
customer_reviews.text: This Murrow is awesome. My grandbaby see's herself in it and I can see her from my rear view mirror. And easy to install
customer_reviews.author: doublediamon

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror, but cheap buckles!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mirror! With my first child, I bought a cheap one from target and I absolutely hated how it wasn’t adjustable, and it wasn’t a very clear mirror. I love how this one adjusts to the perfect position, and it’s SUPER clear! I can see my son perfectly! The reason I gave 4 stars is because I had to move the mirror to a different seat, and when I went to tighten the straps, the buckle completely snapped off! I can still make it work, I’m just a little sad at how cheap the buckles were! So just make sure you pull extra gently when tightening it! Other than that, it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Derek webb

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for rear facing infant
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror for viewing rear-facing baby in car seat. It should be noted that it can only attach to an adjustable head rest. Currently, my baby’s car seat is set up in the middle seat which doesn’t have a headrest. I attached the mirror to headrest on the passenger side then adjusted the angle so it still works to view from the driver seat. I thought it was easy to install and adjust. I will be much happier being able to view my baby while driving.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaW

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this.
customer_reviews.text: I have a crossover vehicle and my back seat does not have a middle headrest, but I keep my baby in the middle so I needed a mirror that would allow me to see him to ensure he's not choking (because he makes little to no noise when spitting up). This mirror fits snug against the headrest (can be tightened or loosened accordingly) and can be angled as needed to see your baby. The mirror is very sturdy and I don't really have any safety concerns....anything can happen in an accident, but I rather know that my infant is safe in the backseat when there is no one else in the car to watch after him.
customer_reviews.author: S. A.

customer_reviews.title: Best baby mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best baby mirror! This is actually the 3rd one we've purchased as I accidentally broke one (totally my fault, I supported my weight on it when it was cold and it cracked). The mirror is large and I can see my baby plus the entire car seat. It stays in place and if installed correctly, it does not jiggle or move. My twins like it too because they can see themselves in it and love to say hi and laugh at themselves. It's easy to install and I don't feel like the mirror would fall off which was important to me. Overall I would get this mirror again and again!
customer_reviews.author: faithmay

customer_reviews.title: Hope you have strong hands!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this I noticed the warehouse had like 20 of them in “ opened boxes “ and I 100% understand why. The clip is extremely difficult to install and the “ range of motion” is misleading ... the ball will move if you press it to a hard surface and push as hard as you can it will slowly move. I have debated returning this and buying a different one but then I’d have to disconnect the piece that took 3 adult males 15 min to push in. I’m actually very disappointed with how difficult this “ snap on” rotating ball piece was to install
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Barger

customer_reviews.title: Absolute MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two other mirrors from big box stores trying to make sure I have a good view of my son and none of them worked. My son spent 90 days in the NICU and is going home on oxygen. We traveled from across country for his care and I refused to leave the state and spend that kind of time in the car if I couldn't see him. This mirror gives an amazing BIG full view of him (other mirrors I could only see the top of his forehead) absolutely love it and wish I would have had it for my other two kids when they were born.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but strap broke about a month after install making it useless
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the baby in the back seat, but it didn't last very long. There is a strap that stabilizes it vertically on the seat headrest and a strap that goes around the head rest (horizontally). Not long after installing it, one of the clips on the vertically stabilizing strap broke so the mirror just slides down on the head-rest and is practically useless. I should have known this would be junk from some of the other reviews and the price. Look for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Y KravitzTop Contributor: Fantasy Books

customer_reviews.title: Large, clear, but shaky when driving
customer_reviews.text: I love how big this mirror is, as I can see my baby's entire carseat. The rotating arm on the back makes it easy to position at literally any spot, but I've found this also makes the mirror unstable while driving. Since it doesn't rest flat against the headrest, it slightly bounces around as I drive. This makes it shaky and hard to clearly see my baby. I have to really focus for a few seconds to see her, which can be dangerous to do while driving down the road. Overall it's a good, large, clear mirror, I just wish it was more stable.
customer_reviews.author: K Gray

customer_reviews.title: The mirror works great, shakes a little on bumpy roads but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in May of 2017 and as I was putting it together the swivel piece broke I was so devastated. I emailed the company and asked if the could send a swivel piece to me, rather than buy a whole mirror again. But they sent me a whole mirror no charge. The mirror works great, shakes a little on bumpy roads but I can see my baby perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we need!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at a name brand mirror that the big box stores sell for twice the cost because of the swivel arm feature. When I saw this one on amazon with the same feature (overall looks very similar to the name brand one) I thought I would try it out. We ended up buying two of them...one for each carseat. I'm very happy with that decision! The mirror is nice and big so its easy to see the babies. The swivel is stiff enough that it doesn't jiggle and move with the vibration of the car but easy enough to adjust. It attaches firmly to the head rest. Honestly, can't go wrong for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value! A must have for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror has been perfect for seeing my rear-facing newborn easily. I had a smaller, basic mirror before this, and I felt like I couldn’t really see her in the backseat. It’s easy to adjust to the right angle to see the baby, and it’s much bigger than the traditional mirrors I’ve found in stores. I was impressed with the quality as well. I’ve been using it a few months now and have had no concerns over its durability. Definitely helps with my peace of mind! I’ll be buying a couple more to replace the smaller ones being used for my toddler too!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on mirrors that lack a pivot point. This one is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: We used the generic baby mirror you can register for at Target. It's a pain. It never stays in the same place. Near impossible to adjust without getting out of the car and spending 10 minutes of infuriating frustration while your child is screaming at the tops of his lungs because he threw his toys out of reach...sorry...back to the product. This product is a vast improvement on that design. It attaches soo easily on the headrest and it pivots easily to the place you need it and it STAYS THERE. If you need to adjust it from the front seat, that is easy as well. Buy this. Don't buy that other crap. Save yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Adam CarriganTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Last!!
customer_reviews.text: Inititally, this seemed like a great product. Looked exactly as described, attached to the headrest in my car easily and seemd like it was going to be just fine. Three weeks later, I got in my car and the mirror was lying in the carseat! Thank goodness my granddaughter was not in the carseat when it fell! The straps were fine, but the piece that connects the back of the mirror to the rotating ball just broke off! I had only adjusted it one time and it didn't seem stressed, but it just broke! I will NOT be purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: BPrigmore

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Good mirror that does the job. I'm able to see my baby while driving and the mirror doesn't move . It's adjustable so I can position it the correct way and it's not blocking my view out of the rearview mirror. The only downfall is at night it's hard to see my baby, but I guess all mirrors w/o a light would be the same way.
customer_reviews.author: R Gonder

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror, horrible mount
customer_reviews.text: A pretty big mirror with decent view but some pretty big flaws. It broke within 2 months and minimal adjustments. The mirror itself is pretty good but the ball joint is weak as are the edges where the straps are secured. In my case those edges broke within 2 months and the mirror came crashing into baby - but it’s plastic and safe so no harm to baby. Can a new version of the mount fix its flaws? Absolutely, but unfortunately the product as exists today is not good enough for the market.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Lashley

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this, until it broke. The piece that holds it on the part that moves snapped. Luckily my infant wasn’t in the seat at the time. I was driving on a mildly bumpy road and it snapped randomly. Lasted 7 months... cheap plastic I guess. I hardly ever adjusted it. I guess it’s no good unless you are only driving on completely smooth roads. Even then I expected it to last longer. It should survive some bumps, seems like a liability if it hurts someone’s child when it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: SarahL

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband's truck since he was complaining about not having a mirror like mine. Well we finally installed them. Directions were easy to follow and easy to install. I really love how you can adjust the baby mirror instead of the rearview mirror of the vehicle. The other day my husband got out of his truck and said these mirrors are amazing. My husband usually doesn't comment on anything so since he did I figured it was worth a review.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Product pieces don't fit together
customer_reviews.text: Piece on the back didn't fit into the mirror which means the product can't be used. Just to make sure I was doing it right I had two other people in my house read the instructions and try and no one could get it in it was too big. What was really annoying was the quality control sicker on the back. That must be a lie obviously this product was not inspected.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Kris

customer_reviews.title: Mirror won’t stay attached and falls into my car seat
customer_reviews.text: I really do love how clear the mirror is and that it straps to the seat but it was really complicated to attach the mirror piece to the seat attachment from day one. Maybe I had a broken one? The reviews are so great so I was surprised. The clip it snaps into never held the mirror. It constantly fell into my babies lap. I thought maybe it was facing to far down and the weight was an issue so I adjusted it and still have the same issue. It eventually broke the piece that holds the mirror in place. Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Julian

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Baby Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I had originally ordered a fancy mirror that has lights and plays sounds, but my baby wasn't a huge fan, all the extras detracted from the quality of the mirror itself, and it kept falling and angling in such a way that I couldn't actually see my daughter. I swapped it out for this one and could not be happier! This mirror was easy to install, is large, and has a perfect swivel system that makes it easy to angle and hold the angle you position it at. A great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: SFR

customer_reviews.title: A Must have baby item.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to be used for our baby since she was rear facing in the car seat. It’s a must have because you can see the baby and baby can see you. It made me feel more safe with her since I could see her. The mirror is big and clear. The only thing I didn’t like about it was that it wore out quickly and soon wouldn’t hold its place where we set it, it would slide and face downwards and then fall off the base. I wish it came in one piece, it may not have this issue then.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this "mirror"
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have received a mirror... since that's what I ordered. Well, I guess you could call this a mirror, but it is the worst quality mirror I have ever looked at. It reminds me of when you change the rear view mirror at night... how you have like "ghosts" of what you actually want to see. Maybe some shiny tin foil would work better for me to see my little baby. I wish I could return this and get a better product, but I took the "mirror" protector sheet off. Don't buy this. Spend your money and get a better quality. I almost did and should have.
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to install in terms of attaching it to the headrest. It can be a little tricky to adjust to personal liking, but that is negligible. Once our kids got a little bigger and their legs longer, it's a little more difficult to keep in place because they like to mess with it, but we do like this product and that has nothing to do with the actual functionality. It holds its place well after adjusted, unless it is accidentally hit while putting your kiddo in the car. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: saxigray89

customer_reviews.title: Broke off on a bumpy road
customer_reviews.text: I liked this mirror for its clear/wide view but it must be poorly made because it randiy snapped off and landed in my baby’s lap while we were driving down a dirt road. We were going under 10 miles per hour, and being very careful, and it completely snapped off! I’m just thankful it didn’t hit his face 🤦🏼‍♀️ I had the same mirror for my older son without any issues so maybe we got a lemon but I can’t recommend this product 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Akaela P.

customer_reviews.title: Holy Amazing Mirror, Batman!
customer_reviews.text: I had a different brand before this one. This WAS a little harder to install, BUT... This is SO FAR ABOVE AND BEYOND. It's SO CLEAR. Stays on there tightly, and I love that I can move it up and down with ease. It's also wider than most, so I can see more of him. He loves it too! Highly recommend this, so you can keep your little ones rear facing longer (at least two years old, but preferably four years old!)
customer_reviews.author: Reya

customer_reviews.title: The best mirror I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.text: With my son we got a soft mirror, it shattered. Then we tried a mirror similar to this (but a different brand) the strap snapped and it nearly fell on him! We got this mirror as a baby shower gift for my daughter and I love it! It’s the first mirror I’ve had where the image wasn’t distorted. I can clearly see my baby! The straps are secure and safe! And it is easy to adjust. Buying another one for my son!
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Big viewing area, doesn't stay up on big flat headrest.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this specifically for a road trip and it held up ok. You have to adjust this constantly because it will slide down after driving on a bumpy road for a while. I was going to return it when I got home but it was past the return window. I like that the viewing area is so big but it doesn't help when it falls down and your kid is staring at a reflection of the floor.
customer_reviews.author: amanda heinsman

customer_reviews.title: Read before buying
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to start off by saying this mirror has a 100% better idea then the normal Velcro to the back of the head rest idea. But I feel the product design could be a lot easier for the consumer. Maybe it was just the one I got with a default but it was hard to actually swivel the mirror. I don’t know if the spring was too tight or what, but my boyfriend had to unscrew the screws on the back to loosen it up and now looks like it would fall off. Great idea, good product, horrible design.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Spears

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in December right after my daughter was born and it worked great. It’s now 6 months later and it randomly just broke while I was driving and flew towards my daughter but thank god it didn’t hit her. I’m upset because I paid for this thinking it would last me until she was old enough to be forward facing but unfortunately not. Idk how it even broke because no one touches it since it is set in a position where I can see her perfectly and she’s not big enough to even reach it. Very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but Weird Mounting - Solved
customer_reviews.text: Update: 10 May 2020. Good customer service, new manufacturer for better equipment and seller is pretty good with working with you and providing options. PROS. Very sturdy product. CONS. (Old manufacturer error) Improper mounting parts. Older model: Equivalent to giving someone a lock and a "matching" baseball bat to open it with instead of a key...useless. Sucky barely sticky mounting pad. This has been corrected! Yay
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Brakes easily
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to install but it is the second one we bought and second time it has broken all within 5 months of our first child being born. The ball sticks in the socket and you literally cannot move it or else it will snap. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Not for fixed headrest
customer_reviews.text: I have a Toyota Camry and the fixed headrests in the back made it so I am not able to use this. Too bad I tested it out after the return window ended... make sure you check if you have headrests that are adjustable or else it will also not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: It’s very helpful if you have your car seat in the middle seat with no headrest
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror. It is large and clear to see baby. It’s very helpful if you have your car seat in the middle seat with no headrest - it can be placed on one of the side seats and angled towards the middle. The only issue is that if someone sits in that seat, they usually end up moving it by accident and then it needs to be adjusted before driving again. However, this problem is sort of unavoidable since it needs to swivel easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, simple car mirror with nice wide view angle
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mirror to replace an older product that broke when I was traveling. This mirror was easy to set up, and I found the two straps keep the mirror securely fitted against the headrest. I like the large size and slight convex curve to the mirror's surface, which gives a wide-angle view and makes it easier to see my kid when the mirror is mounted on the headrest at the opposite side of the car from her car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Yeah

customer_reviews.title: Easy, big & works great!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is awesome. I had another one that just clipped and you had to adjust the straps and move the mirror around and I couldn’t get it to work right in my Chevy Tahoe. More of a pain than helpful. I set this new one up in less than five minutes and was ready to go. It’s easily maneuvers to the best angle but it tight enough in its pivot not to be bumped or jolted easily out of place. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DaniCaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works only if baby's feet can't reach it
customer_reviews.text: This mirror worked okay, although not great (I had to periodically readjust it) but only until my baby got into a convertible seat. Once in a convertible seat, his feet could reach the mirror and he promptly kicked it off, breaking the mirror off at the handle. I bought another kind instead, one that does not have a handle but the mirror is built into the body of a plush toy (giraffe). That new one is so much better! It has a larger view and even with baby kicking at it, it does not turn out of place. I wish I had gotten that from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Orange Tree

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away
customer_reviews.text: I’m sadly disappointed with this mirror. When I started to install the straps on the headrest and pulled to tighten the extra slack the plastic clip shattered! Just by tightening the strap?!? I didn’t even get to use it before it broke. I tried to make due with just one strap but it’s not secure enough. Also it is difficult to see the baby, not sure if it’s the mirror or the lighting in the car but for whatever reason it’s isn't working out. Sad I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Dalley

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and then received two of a different kind as a gift. I used the other thinking I would have matching ones for each car but they absolutely are the worst... so I busted this one out and it is amazing! I love that it has the swivel and the 4 strap back! Super easy to install and the swivel makes it easy to get it where you want it! I will Definitely be purchasing another one for my other vehicle! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Purchased on a whim
customer_reviews.text: Just installed two of these today, one in a sedan and one in a SUV. I think this mirror is more secure in a SUV as I did knock it around some getting the car seat in and out of my sedan, where I have the car seat base installed in the middle seat. I had some difficulty snapping in the rotating part into both mirrors, but once it's in, it's not going anywhere. Very pleased with the quality of the mirror overall and can't wait to use it when our baby arrives in less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: pinkstarbuddy101

customer_reviews.title: You might have to manhandle it to get it to put together
customer_reviews.text: Putting this thing together is a big pain. There's only two steps. You slide one piece together and make sure a prong pops up to hold it. Mine didn't so I ended up prying it up myself. The second part, attaching the swivel was bad enough I thought it was defective. You have to hulk out and press really hard down so you can get the lever in place. I haven't managed to put it on the car yet 😂. Also included is a message saying you'll get 15 bucks if you leave a 5 star review. Much as I like money so far this isn't 5 stars....
customer_reviews.author: Danielle McLean

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. This has really helped my anxiety over not being able to see my baby in the car seat. I love that I can watch her and check in even from the passenger seat. The mirror is the perfect size and I love how I can rotate it either horizontally or vertically. It was very easy to install and I am so thoroughly pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Large, Clear Image
customer_reviews.text: I love how big the mirror is. We can see so much of the baby and carseat. Many other mirrors with our first child were not this large! It is very clear and easy to install. I do find its ability to move a little stiff which has pro and cons. Pro is it won't shift while you're driving but it is hard to easily get perfect angle. Overall, happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Eyes That Shine

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Straps Longevity
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this to anyone needing a good backseat mirror. Easy to install and adjust - and it stays in place! Just note, that the plastic will weaken after being installed for a few years. I went to move the mirror from one car to another and the plastic used for the buckles and backing literally fell apart in my hands. I bought another one, because I still think it's a great product; but that's what caused a 4 vice 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mirror itself is fine. The webbing has disintegrated just after a year. My car is never parked in a garage, so I assume the sun did it in. However... this problem could be avoided by using even slightly more high-quality webbing. It's a shame because the rest of the product is in fine condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia W.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this back seat baby mirror. I bought one for my car when I drive my granddaughter around. I love it so much and it gives me great peace of mind to know that I can easily look back and see what my granddaughter is doing. It is very easy to install and it stays put even on bumpy roads. In fact I liked it so much I bought one for my daughter's car as well. She loves it just as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: jsergo

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected
customer_reviews.text: We use these mirrors in a corolla and an Elantra. They work well and are easy to install if you have a partner to help you out. Only downside is that they don’t maintain a snug fit on the headrest and the positioning gets a bit off. You can still see your baby, but just might need to stretch a bit while in en route to get the view you like.
customer_reviews.author: Mkane23

customer_reviews.title: Great car mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great car mirror. We had a cheap one with our first and it was a NIGHTMARE. This one is so much better. Very secure on the headrest. My only complaint is that it easily moves. I put it right in the sweet spot and then sometimes knock it when pulling out my chunk and have to find a good spot again. Luckily the mirror is REALLY big so even when I knock it I can still see my baby's head in the corner. Warning, it took about 2 weeks for me to stop staring at my baby in the mirror while driving. So dangerous, but I could NOT resist how adorable he looks!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Sanity saver!
customer_reviews.text: My baby looooves this! It was a serious game changer for car rides. It is large enough for me to see her, but she can also see me and herself! She used to cry a lot, now she enjoys seeing herself and looking over at me. Easy installation, sturdy, convenient. I love being able to talk to her and her seeing me- our car time has truly changed for the better
customer_reviews.author: AJuarez

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror for the price. Love that it’s large enough to see the baby and not obstruct my rear window view. The adjustable rotation is necessary for our SUV has headrests don’t tilt. Other mirrors we installed before would never be positioned correctly to see our baby. This tilt option is perfect. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: cds

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money - Easy to install and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: After researching a lot, I went ahead with this baby car mirror and it worked like a charm. Easy to install and the range of motion is also good. My baby arrived couple of weeks ago and so far its good. I am happy with this purchase. I will update later on how this is performing may be after 6-8 months. But as of now its #1. Happy Customer
customer_reviews.author: LPM

customer_reviews.title: 0 stars! Super flimsy
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I spent a good 30 minutes trying to install this flimsy thing. The thing that’s supposed to “pop up” and lock the mirror onto the backing is so flimsy, as soon as you barely try to adjust it it just falls off. Yes, we heard it click into place! It’s just that flimsy. We weren’t doing anything wrong on our part, and we followed the enclosed instructions to a T. Returning this and buying a better mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Soraya Katmeh

customer_reviews.title: Installation; the  swivel is snug!
customer_reviews.text: At first I couldn’t figure out how to assemble the mirror but once I actually looked at the pictures provided on the instructions it was easy to see my error. Putting the swivel mount in was a little rough but with a Little patience I was able to lock in place. Would rather have it snug than fall out! Looking forward to seeing my little one through the mirrors!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Kobielski

customer_reviews.title: Large Mirror and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The baby rear headrest mirror is very large, clear and clean, which allows for easy viewing of the rear-facing carseat. Installation process for the headrest/mirror base attachment is straightforward and simple with two cinch on straps. The only complaint is the swivel head for the mirror base is very difficult to maneuver which makes it hard to adjust to the proper angle for viewing, but it may decrease excessive movement of the mirror when the car is moving. Overall, little complaints at this time, and brought two mirrors since they are pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk and no return
customer_reviews.text: It lasted less than a month before the back bracket broke. I tried to return on line without success. Don't buy it. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dad approved
customer_reviews.text: I’m a first time father and love to spend time with my baby boy. Sometimes he cries and I don’t know why because I can’t see him. I bought this thing because the wife told me I’d enjoy seeing the funny faces he makes because she has one for her car. I’m glad I bought it. I love how he can see me and I can clearly see him especially. I can calm him down a little better now when he cries. And when he sees me he smiles and calms down while we are running errands together. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Bounmee Kanthathin

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to Install and steardy
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit diappointed with the product.... it was not easy to install it and even after install it is not steardy..... while driving you can see it moving and dont have steardy view of the baby
customer_reviews.author: iqra arshad

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this mirror after trying many others this is definitely the best!
customer_reviews.text: No reason to by any other mirror ! I went though several different mirrors and this was the one that worked the best bc of the fact you can adjust it any way you want. I have a very tall car seat and had to turn it long ways( side ways) to see my son and this is the only mirror I found that does that with out paying outrageous prices.
customer_reviews.author: Snyder

customer_reviews.title: high quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a mirror like this a year ago ( different brand) and it was just made cheap and broke within a few months. So I ordered this one to replace it and so far I have no complaints. I could tell just by opening it that it is good quality and should be durable and last long. would definitely recommend! this is also the type of mirror I chose because in my Jeep there is no center head rest so I install the mirror on the passenger side headrest and can turn it to face my baby and be able to see him perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Robbins

customer_reviews.title: This is the only baby car mirror you should buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product almost 2 months ago and thus far have been great. It's easy to position the mirror due to the ball and socket joint, the mirror has 2 sizable belts to fit it on the car seat headrest. The overall size of the mirror is just appropriate. With the price offered for this mirror, the size and the quality, this is the only mirror you should think of buying Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Naveen

customer_reviews.title: It looks and feels like a sturdy option
customer_reviews.text: So I’d give 5/5 for what it is, but make sure you check your headrests before you do. Totally my pregnancy brain that wasn’t working quite right when I bought these before realizing the headrests in our Toyota Camry don’t adjust, so the vertical strap can’t be attached. We haven’t tried attaching it with the other, which I’m sure could be done. 100% my fault. It looks and feels like a sturdy option. Clear reflection, too, which wasn’t the case with another mirror we were looking at.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely Unusable
customer_reviews.text: I received this mirror and am unable to use it at all because the swivel mount was NOT included with mine. It doesn't even look like there is room in the box for the swivel mount to be included. Without the mount.... there is NO way to attach the mirror, I might as well have just lit $16 on fire, same effect. I have reached out to the seller on this matter. IF they correct this mistake, I will edit my review once I am able to actually use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Just another car mirror
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these and one was easier than the other to put together and one is a lot shakier than the other when you’re on the road. There really wasn’t consistency between the two. We haven’t traveled enough to say if we like these that much or not but the little bit that we have, they served their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Elle0626

customer_reviews.title: not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge fan of this mirror & will probably end up buying something else before too long. I love how easy it is to install & the fact it can be adjusted to the angle I need; however, I can't see my baby clearly at all. it reminds me of the panorama setting on a phone because of the wide range.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke T.

customer_reviews.title: wide viewing angle and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We loved this mirror so much we bought a second one for other car. Wide angle without distortion and you can easily see baby from both front seats. Holds steady after install and does not easily move when bumped which is always so infuriating to me. I could not figure out how to attach it to base but husband installed in less than 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lance J. Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Functional, yeah
customer_reviews.text: This mirror works great! I should have considered how much my daughter makes me laugh though, before giving myself a perfect view of her dancing in her backward facing car seat while I’m driving. We love to jam, and she has the biggest smile for a 17 month old. Honestly, it’s pretty distracting, so I try not to use it as much. I’m just glad it’s there in case of an emergency and I can’t turn around for some reason, I can still see her through the rear view mirror. I took a star off because not all of the parts click together correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Madie

customer_reviews.title: Great Option!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is generously sized and was easy to install. Holds position well when installed and after adjusted to best see baby. Recommend two people to install so person in front seat can direct person in rear what to adjust for best view of baby. It is great to see baby while driving to know all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay Graham

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've had great usage of this product. It does what it is supposed to do. It is a larger size, which, helps for me and baby to clearly see one another. It is so helpful when driving to be able to glance in my mirror and see how he's doing. The functionality worked great. The mirror pivots and moves very easily. The straps are very secure to the headrest and it works great. Very good buy and very useful for myself and my family. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sharina

customer_reviews.title: Large Mirror, Great for Seeing Baby
customer_reviews.text: I love how large the mirror is. I had a smaller mirror before and it was incredibly hard to see my baby. This mirror is large and pivots any direction you need which makes it very handy for being able to keep an eye on your little one while driving. I wish I had purchased it for my first but am very happy to have it for my second baby.
customer_reviews.author: Go Motivate Yourself

customer_reviews.title: I can see my baby at all times.
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is awesome. Its wide and hangs really well to the headrest. I can see my baby clearly. The only thing is that at night you do need a nearby light because its so dark that i cant see my baby. What i also loved is that the mirror is big enough that i can also see my son thats sitting on the other side of the car in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Amalia N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and Clean look after install
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is quite big and clean looking which is a huge plus! quite sturdy after installed, the only gripe I have is the mount that is to be attached to the mirror is a bit of a pain to attach. But after a bit of forcefulness it does get attached and the viewing angles makes it all worth it. I for sure recommend this item, its worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: MIKE C.

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror. Bigger and Clearer than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is great and actually bigger than expected which helps even more. We have another mirror in our other vehicle but that one makes the reflection look quite far. This new mirror makes it look like our baby is closer, which is great. Also, it is clearer than others we've had before.
customer_reviews.author: Giorgio Cavalli

customer_reviews.title: Works ok, but lousy attachment
customer_reviews.text: This mirror works, but the mount is really rough and hard to use. It takes brutal force to click it together, and just has a lot of hallmarks of low cost/low quality manufacturing. At the end of the day it does the job, but for a slightly higher price than others, I expected it to be better.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place when driving.
customer_reviews.text: Scratches a bit easier than I’d like, but I think with the safety features it’s hard to avoid this. My 2 year old is also rough with this mirror, grabs it when getting in her seat, moves it, kicks it, etc.. I like that even with all the abuse she doles out, it still will sit firmly where I put it. It doesn’t droop after driving. I have to move it to he correct position a lot, but it isn’t the products fault, just the crazy child. Would/will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product was difficult to snap together. Also, one of the clips broke in the first month we had it. It works well for seeing your little one, though. Update: this company has excellent customer service. I was contacted by a representative and given a replacement mirror. I was highly impressed and will order from them again if given the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Sabah

customer_reviews.title: not adjustable for certain cars
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this doesnt work in my car or my husbands car (Jetta and a BMW) because the headrests do not move - so the hook can only be half attached to the car - this made me nervous that it would fall on our baby. The clip also seemed a little faulty. Unit challenging to put together. Unfortunately, given all that is going on currently missed the return window but will not be using this. Recommend checking out your car headseats before ordering - if they move up and down this can be a great option.
customer_reviews.author: charles richard fagenholz

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mirror so much with my first kid that I bought two more when the second kid came. These were purchased on 1/4/20. Unfortunately one day while driving home the mirror fell off the headrest and hit my infant. I’m not exactly sure what happened because the mirror was never dropped or hit by anything. I took it in the house and saw that the attachment point had a crack in it. Maybe from the heat? I would still give at least 4 stars because I understand that some freak accidents happen but I gave 3 stars because it’s almost impossible to get a hold of the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer del Rosario
